name: Big Steal Cars: Third Edition Zombies VR
name_original: Big Steal Cars: Third Edition Zombies VR
description:
What this is:

Well it could have been "Grandest Auto Thief: Third" but I went with the more boring "Big Steal Cars: Third Edition Zombies VR" since I had already named my files that.

This is a sandbox game world inspired by the classic game with a similar name and based on a map in that style by Assetto Corsa modders that I imported into Godot.

This was a learning experiment so I figured I would share with other people who are learning how to create things so they can learn too and maybe have some fun.  Please read the Installation Readme, Credits file, and the Game Control Instructions (which are inside the zip).

Built with Godot and Godot XR and XR Tools plugins!!  Check it out if you want to build your own game!

This is a PCVR only experience, and runs on Open XR.  

Just unzip the folder anywhere on your computer and run the .exe to play.  Let me know if you have any issues playing since I am still learning!

Things you can do: 

Physically jog in place to move in game

Drive a car around with motion controls

Explore the world

Climb almost anywhere

Fly

Grapple

Shoot zombies, which will spawn every 30 seconds ago after you vanquish each bunch

Use "bullet time" and "Max Payne" style bullet time dive mechanics to kill the zombies
